DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose conduct randomize control trial 200 overweight/obese pregnant woman offspring . The prenatal intervention emphasize improve diet physical activity . The lifestyle intervention deliver within empowerment theoretical framework combination group session , individual counseling , monitor compliance diet physical activity tailor intervention . The post-partum intervention session include mother offspring focus breastfeeding , improve physical activity quality diet feeding practice first post-partum year . As part routine prenatal care , participant control intervention arm give health-related advice . Since majority participant expect eligible Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) program , group also receive assistance WIC per routine policy . Our primary outcome Gestational Weight Gain ( GWG ) . The major secondary outcome interest infant BMI z-score 12 month age , investigator also evaluate several metabolic outcome mother infant .
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity hyperglycemia pregnancy think impact fetal growth over-nutrition may stress fetal pancreas increase demand insulin . Such intrauterine program event affect birth weight raise offspring 's risk trajectory future obesity , type 2 diabetes , cardiovascular disease premature death . Investigators propose conduct randomize control trial 200 overweight obese pregnant Puerto Rican woman ( free diabetes ) infant , favorably impact metabolic health mother infant . Women present randomized lifestyle modification intervention standard care control group 16 gestational week . The intervention focus improving : ( 1 ) physical activity level ( 2 ) diet quality calorie intake . The lifestyle intervention deliver within empowerment theoretical framework individualize intervention session , intensive group session , phone call . The intervention continue first postpartum year include infant . A key objective evaluate whether intervention optimize infant BMI z-score . We also evaluate whether intervention increase number woman experience appropriate gestational weight gain , evaluate several additional aim include relate intervention improve insulin sensitivity beta-cell function woman , insulin concentration adjust glucose infants.This study also help u identify overcome barrier develop effective way intervene pregnancy meaningfully improve cardio-metabolic risk trajectory future generation .
DOC.criteria: Singleton viable pregnancy . A twin pregnancy reduce singleton 14 week project gestational age acceptable . An ultrasound must conduct randomization show fetal heartbeat ; evidence one fetus recent prerandomization ultrasound . * Gestational age randomization earlier 9 week 0 day later 15 week 6 day base algorithm compare last menstrual period ( LMP ) date data early ultrasound . * BMI ≥25 kg/m2 base first trimester measure weight measure height . The early weight measurement randomization , measure specifically study use . Reported prepregnancy weight use determine eligibility potential inaccuracy . If early weight measurement conduct 140 146 week 150 156 week , 1 lb 2 lb subtract measure weight respectively , adjust first trim weight . * Age ≥ 18* Diagnosis diabetes prior pregnancy ( report physician diagnose diabetes GDM previous pregnancy take insulin medication treat diabetes ) , HbA1c ≥ 6.5 % test result ( elevate fast glucose ≥126 mg/dL/7.0 mmol/L 2 h glucose ≥200 mg/dL/11.1 mmol/L OGTT complete ) suggestive prepregnancy diabetes . All potential participant HbA1c perform prior randomization . * Known fetal anomaly * Planned termination pregnancy* History three consecutive first trimester miscarriages* Past history anorexia bulimia medical history patient report . Binge eat disorder exclusion* Current eat disorder diagnose EDEQ question 24 confirmed discussion participant study staff* Actively suicidal define value ≥ 2 BDIII question 9* Prior plan ( within 1 year expect delivery ) bariatric surgery* Current use one follow medication : * Metformin Systemic steroid Antipsychotic agent Antiseizure medication mood stabilizer would expect significant impact body weight Medications ADHD include amphetamine methylphenidate Continued use weight loss medication include OTC dietary supplement weight loss * Contraindications aerobic exercise pregnancy specify ACOG Committee Opinion # 267 , 2002 ( reaffirmed 2009 ) * Hemodynamically significant heart disease define AHA class II ( short breath exercise ) great Restrictive lung disease ( e.g . pulmonary fibrosis ) Poorly control seizure disorder Poorly control hypertension ( blood pressure ≥160/110 ) History extreme sedentary lifestyle ( e.g . bed bound ) Orthopedic limitation aerobic exercise Severe anemia define hemoglobin < 8 g/dl hematocrit < 24 % Participation another interventional study influence weight control* Enrollment trial previous pregnancy* Intention participant care provider delivery outside LIFEMoms Consortium hospital* Participant 's unwillingness inability commit 1 year followup child , include plan move away* Past current intravenous drug use ( visual check injection mark , record methadone use , selfreport ) Selfreported HIV infection ( confirm medical record baseline test result ) Inability functionally participate group session study requirement regular basis complete duration study , include limited document use accelerometer period require study Non Spanish speaking Plan give infant adoption '* ' Core eligibility criterion LIFEMoms Consortium
